#summary OpenPGM 5 : C Reference : Monitoring and Administration : pgm_snmp_shutdown()
#labels Phase-Implementation
#sidebar TOC5CReferenceMonitoringAndAdministration
_Function_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/snmp.h>

bool *pgm_snmp_shutdown* (void);
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
Stop and destroy a running SNMP agent or master agent.

=== Return Value ===
On success, <tt>TRUE</tt> is returned.  On error, <tt>FALSE</tt> is returned.
